content:
Twilight draped itself over us like a velvet shawl, deep blues giving way to indigo while city lights blinked awake. We walked along the river, our breaths intertwining in the cool air, our fingers threaded together like roots beneath soil.

In that moment, love was a tangible warmth radiating between us, a universe we had built from stolen glances and shared secrets. The memory glows in my heart, a lantern guiding me through darker nights.
